name: CubeRisk
description:
This is the first game I ever made and I'm still learning right now. I got this from a YouTube called Brackeys. Please subscribe to his channel.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPV2KyIb3jR53Jce9hP7G5xC4O9AgnOuL

This game is made with Unity and the gameplay is different on every PC since it is dependent on the amount of frames per second your PC runs the game.
